titleStmt.title: The order of the installation of Prince George of Denmark, Charles Duke of Somerset, and George Duke of Northvmberland, knights and companions of the most noble Order of the Garter in the royal chappel of St. George at Windsor, April the 8th, 1684.
titleStmt.author: King, Gregory, 1648-1712.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Gregory King. Cf. NUC-pre 1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
